column5: Sabourin Lake lodge is on my listsabourinlake.com
Silver Water Wheel Lodge, Lac Seul
2 votes for SWWL! Wish I had the cash for a one week stay.

Check out www.birchdalelodge.com Get one of the upgrade cabins, they have hot tubs in them. They also have "The Bullpit Steakhouse" on the premises where you can grill your own steak indoors or they will grill it for you. This is included with the american plan. I have taken my wife up for our anniversary and had them put flowers and a nice bottle of wine in the cabin for our arrival. My wife isn't much of a fisherman, we took a guide for the week and she really enjoyed it. Contact Cheryl at 807-227-5262 and she will take care of you.

I want to take my wife for a "top shelf" Canadian fishing vacation that would include excellent fishing for Smallmouth, Walleye and Northern, with a guide, in a comfortable boat, the American plan and a nice room. The availability of a one day fly-out to a "specialty' lake would be a bonus. Please let me know if you know of such a place. Thanks
http://www.wollastonlakelodge.com/I have never been, but saw this place on Babe's show.
A fellow WC member owns Hawk Lake Lodge, looks pretty nice! www.hawk-lake.com
Try Tetu Island Lodge. www.tetuislandlodge.com My wife calls it "fantasy Island!"
Check out www.garden-island.com I believe they even have a couples only week.FC
If you want top notch in Ontario with all the best, you can not beat Tetu.
Thanks, guys. I hope to schedule a nice fishing vacation that she will really enjoy. Your suggestions are appreciated.
Ganglers, Northern Manitoba, Very pricey but first class all the way. No smallmouth but excellent pike, lakers walleye
